trans-unit.source: Contains communication data sent between cooperating message sinks.
trans-unit.target: 包含接收合作的訊息之間傳送資料的通訊。

trans-unit.source: Message sinks that use IMessage can be placed in the client sink chains or in the server sink chains.
trans-unit.target: 訊息接收器 IMessage 可以放在用戶端接收鏈結或伺服器接收鏈結中使用。

trans-unit.source: A message object is passed from message sink to message sink through the chain, and carries a set of named properties such as action identifiers, envoy information, and parameters.
trans-unit.target: 訊息物件會從傳遞訊息接收到訊息接收鏈結，，和執行一組動作識別項、 envoy 資訊等參數的具名屬性。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the IMessage interface meets the minimum qualifications to be considered a message object.
trans-unit.target: 實作 IMessage 介面的物件符合最小的識別資格，才會被視為 「 訊息 」 物件。

trans-unit.source: The exact object received by a message sink does not have to be passed on to the next sink, but this is often the case.
trans-unit.target: 收到的訊息接收的物件不需要傳遞給下一個接收，但通常是。

trans-unit.source: Although the objects in the property bag do not have to be serializable, the message sink implementer needs to consider this, since the properties that flow out of the application domain must be serializable.
trans-unit.target: 雖然不一定是可序列化的屬性包中的物件，訊息接收實作器需要考慮，因為傳送出應用程式定義域的屬性必須是可序列化。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that represents a collection of the message's properties.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>表示之訊息的屬性集合。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that represents a collection of the message's properties.
trans-unit.target: 字典，表示訊息屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接呼叫端會透過介面的參考呼叫，而且沒有基礎結構的權限。
